attributes.title: I hate it !
attributes.review: If i could give this app a 0 I WOULD. It took forever to download, then once i opened the app it told my i had an error. Then it wouldn’t let me open the app after i closed it. TERRIBLE. should be taken down !!!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT RECOMMEND WHAT SO EVER
attributes.review: I would give it 0 stars if I could but sadly I can’t. All lies, a total waste of time. So glitchy and just horrible quality. Wasted my storage and took forever to download. I think it’s just a huge waste of time and no point. SO I DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: gen z🧚🏼‍♀️❤️😹✨
attributes.review: so i got this app in high hopes that i could find out what trumps plans are for the rally. unfortunately i couldn’t find out because this app kept kicking me off and glitching me out of the app. every time i try to go on it deletes everything i was on and i can’t finish reading. i just wanted to find out what my amazing president was going to do to win😩😩😩 this app needs to be deleted and he should just have a website.

attributes.title: Disturbing and disgusting
attributes.review: When I got on the app it was invading my space asking me questions that I would rather not answer. It had way to many adds. It was obviously not the app I was hoping for. Do not approve this app

attributes.title: delete this app it’s garbage
attributes.review: this app is so unoriginal and I hate the name of it like Trump? ew tf is a Trump. anyways, this app doesn’t help me in life whatsoever so why do I need it? I don’t. and nobody really needs this app I mean look at all the one stars. so, ✨d e l e t e✨ this stupid app thank you much love!! ✨😌💗😚

attributes.title: This app is an abomination
attributes.review: Since the moment I opened the app it started glitching it was absolutely terrible. It didn’t even show any events or anything important. The app was just dis functional and I am truly disappointed

attributes.title: bad!
attributes.review: this is so bad it kept making my phone crashed and get glitches. The whole app is just set up poorly and very confusing. I wouldn’t recommend getting this app

attributes.title: needs to be removed
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i can get a better perspective on trump but all i saw on the screen was, “make america great again” a bunch of things that made trump look like the good guy. i don’t know about you but i don’t like being lied to and this app is full of lies. an app that’s supposed to provide news about the country is spreading lies and promoting himself to get elected again. i’m not here for this app and it’s very much unreliable.

attributes.title: Horrible experience
attributes.review: The app keeps kicking me out. I know it’s not my WiFi because the other apps work just fine. I think the many reviews might be causing the app to crash. It’s weird.

attributes.title: Not worth the data
attributes.review: I get too many alerts, so I decided to turn them off. After turning off all notifications, it still notifies me! Had to delete. Will stick to Google.
